location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 1 of 1825 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, General Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing Mr Farish that all the public servants at the Bushire Establishment wish to become subscribers to the Native Pension Fund, and that none have previously turned down an opportunity to join. It further requests information on whether agents at stations subordinate to the Bushire Residency should be considered eligible for the fund.
